text: "Body and Soul" is a 1994 song by Anita Baker and is the leading single from her fifth studio album Rhythm of Love. It went to number 36 in the United States, number 48 in the United Kingdom and Scotland and number 14 in the Netherlands. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1995. == References == Category:1994 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Anita Baker songs
title: Body and Soul (Anita Baker song)
